ARABIC: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My Signs were recited to you and you turned round on your heels,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For when My revelations were read out to you, you turned back on your heels and fled
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My Signs were rehearsed to you and you turned back on your heels and took to flight,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Our revelations had certainly been recited to you, but you turned your backs to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “My verses were recited to you, so you used to turn back on your heels.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed My Ayat used to be recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My communications were indeed recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My signs were recited to you, but upon your heels you withdrew,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My revelations were recited unto you, but ye used to turn back on your heels,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My revelations were recited to you, but you turned your backs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely My signs have been rehearsed unto you, and upon your heel ye were wont to draw back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly My signs used to be recited to you, but you used to take to your heels,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed My Verses used to be recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels (denying them, and with hatred to listen to them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My verses were recited to you, but you turned upon your heels,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: My Verses were recited to you, but you turned back on your heels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:66] Verily My signs, in the Qur’ān, used to be recited to you, but you used to take to your heels, falling back in retreat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (My revelations) the Qur'an (were recited) and shown (unto you, but ye used to turn back on your heels) to your initial religion,
